mapper.sql: id, project_id, biddee_id, bidder_id, evaluation_content, score, star_count, insert_time, insert_by
mapper.insert:
insert into t_gcgl_project_evaluation_biddee
id,
project_id,
biddee_id,
bidder_id,
evaluation_content,
score,
star_count,
insert_time,
insert_by,

mapper.update:
update t_gcgl_project_evaluation_biddee
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
biddee_id = #{biddeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bidder_id = #{bidderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
evaluation_content = #{evaluationContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
star_count = #{starCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
insert_by = #{insertBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_gcgl_project_evaluation_biddee set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, biddee_id = #{biddeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bidder_id = #{bidderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, evaluation_content = #{evaluationContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, star_count = #{starCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, insert_by = #{insertBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sum(score)/count(id) from t_gcgl_project_evaluation_biddee where biddee_id = #{biddeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.biddee_id evaluationCompanyId,"BEE" evaluationCompanyType,a.evaluation_content evaluationCompanyContent,a.insert_time evaluationCompanyTime,b.company_name evaluationCompanyName,c.object_name objectName,c.object_id objectId from t_gcgl_project_evaluation_biddee a INNER JOIN t_qyzz_biddee b on a.biddee_id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_ztgl_object c on c.biddee_id = a.id and c.object_status !='CRT' where a.biddee_id = #{biddeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
